summary: This tool helps build incrementing strings
descriptionHtml:
Throughout my life as a modder and now an indi game dev :) i have have a few times where i wished i had something that could help make lists of
incrementing variables eg WeaponType_1 all the way to WeaponType_100
Now thats way to many trips up and down the keyboard with paste and then changing the number 100 times

So i made a tool that when set up increments automatically for you when you paste

[size=5]Settings:[/size]
There are 4 dropdown boxes that have 3 options

[size=4]Static String: [/size]
This is just a plain text field that gets added to the string

[size=4]Numbers:[/size]
This can be set to a max of 9999 and increment or deincrement
it also has include 0 and reverse

[size=4]Custom Strings:[/size]
This is a cycling array of added words or numbers

[size=5]How to use:[/size]
Simply add the required strings then press activate and every time you press
paste (Ctrl + V) you will paste what is written in the preview box
when you are finished click deactivate
There is also cycle forwards and backwards buttons
[size=4]This tool grabs your global (CTRL + V) key press even if not in focus meaning it can be used in any program when activated[/size]

[size=5]Bugs and legal stuff:[/size]
If you find any major bugs please let me know
[size=4]I take no responsibility if this somehow breaks your PC[/size]

[size=5]Credit:[/size]
Feel free to do whatever you want with it so long as it stays free
If anyone would like to help improve it or has a feature request let me know
author: Eskarn
